snippet: Marina Silva, a popular environmentalist, said she would vote for Aécio Neves, a business-minded former governor.
abstract: Marina Silva, popular environmentalist who finished third in first round of Brazil's presidential election, endorses leading opposition candidate Aecio Neves in runoff with Pres Dilma Rousseff.
lead_paragraph: Marina Silva, a popular environmentalist, said she would vote for Aécio Neves, a business-minded former governor.

headline.main: In Brazil Runoff, Third-Place Finisher Endorses Opposition Candidate
headline.print_headline: Third-Place Finisher Endorses Opposition Candidate in Brazil Runoff
